pr_title: Ensure that an uppercase username doesn't break container-image building

timeline.message:
Ensure that an uppercase username doesn't break container image building

Fixes: #8819

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure why we lowercase only in this case? I mean it will fail if the group has some uppercase character, won't it?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
My idea is that it's better to fail if the user explicitly sets a group that is invalid (the error message is very explicit and actionable). I am thinking that if we start changing user supplied configuration it could be a very slippery slope...
If however the user did not set anything and the username was used implicitly, then only in that implicit case should we intervene.
replies.author: geoand
